sources.title: 1970 Altersporno (Old Age Porn)
sources.description: With Ludwig Chateau. The film is the question to an old sculptor from Düsseldorf whether he was willing to participate in an Old Age Porn. On a search for a cuple for a love story with sex beyond the 70 Herbert Götzinger sent me to his colleagues sculptor Ludwig Chateau. During my surprise visit with the running camera, asking if he would be willing to do his part, he attacked me: "Is not that enough what they're doing at this moment?" (LUTZ MOMMARTZ)
